tabContent.question: What is the fully qualified domain name for this application ?
tabContent.description: This should contain both the domain (i.e www.example.com) and host portion (i.e. kb.example.com )
tabContent.name: apinfo2

tabContent.question: Does the application perform multiple functions ?
tabContent.description: Examples of possible application functions may are Customer/partner portal, Knowledge base, E-commerceBusiness to business (B2B) and Web-Services communication
tabContent.name: apinfo3

tabContent.question: Are application specific functions accessed through a specific URIs?
tabContent.description: In some cases different application functions can be accessed through different URIs. For example, web portal functionality will be accessed through: www.example.com/portal, whilst a KB will be accessed through: www.example.com/kb.
tabContent.name: apinfo4

tabContent.question: Are application specific functions accessed through specific HTTP parameters?
tabContent.description: In some cases different application functions can be accessed through different HTTP parameters.For example, web portal will be accessed will be accessed through: www.example.com/en?function=portal,whilst a KB will be accessed through:www.example.com/en?function=kb
tabContent.name: apinfo5
